verbose_text: Estradiol is known for anti-apoptotic effects in some other contexts : for example, studies on C2C12 cells provide evidence that estradiol can be protective from H 2 O 2 -induced apoptosis through modulating P53 and forkhead box transcription factor class O (FOXO) transcription factors and their downstream target genes.
evidence: apoptosis through modulating P53 and forkhead box transcription
